DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether treatment with Symbicort for 12 weeks will improve lung function and symptoms of adults and adolescents with asthma.
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis of asthma Baseline lung function tests as determined by protocol. Required and received treatment with inhaled corticosteroids and/or lung treatments specified in the protocol within timeframe and doses specified in protocol. Severe asthma Has required treatment with any noninhaled corticosteroid within previous 4 weeks, has sensitivity to drugs specified in the protocol or requires treatment with betablockers Had cancer within previous 5 years or currently has any other significant disease or disorder as judged by the investigator
